cleaned_text: Scott T Hamler, MD Family Medicine Locations About Scott T Hamler Scott T. Hamler, M.D., of the Summa Health Pride Clinic provides care for the LGBTQ+ community including hormone replacement therapy, transgender care and PrEP. A graduate of the Medical College of Ohio, he completed his residency at Cleveland Clinic Fairview Hospital. Dr. Hamler is certified by the American Board of Family Medicine. Expertise Education Medical College of Ohio - Toledo Medical School, 2003 Fairview General Hospital Internship, Family Medicine, 2004 Fairview General Hospital Residency, Family Medicine, 2006 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit.
